name: Ridge Racer 7
description:
Ridge Racer 7 is a racing-arcade game developed by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It was originally released in 2006. It was published by Sony Interactive Entertainment. Ridge Racer 7 has a Metascore of 78, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Ridge Racer 7 is available on PlayStation 3.
